title: Mini Threads
description: A simple clone of Meta's Threads. User can make a post, or make a comment to the post, follow users, check out and edit own's profile. Created with next.js, react, tailwindcss, shadcn/ui, node.js, passport.js, express, postgreSQL, prisma, supabase

title: Mini Social Media
description: A simple clone of social media website. User can make a post with photo, or make a comment to the post, follow users, or check out other's profile and edit own's. Created with Ruby on Rails, tailwindcss, omniauth, devise

title: MessageMe Messanger
description: A simple messaging app with http. User can view who's online, send them message, or create a group chat, then check out other's or edit own's profile. Created with react, react-router, node.js, express, prisma, postgreSQL, supabase

title: Game - Where's Waldo
description: Like Where's Waldo, user is given a large image which contains several elements to find. Lastly, user add name to leaderboard. Created with react, vite, bootstrap, node.js, express, mongoDB

title: Cloudy Drive
description: A simple clone of Google Drive. User can upload, delete files, then share the file or folder link to others. Created with ejs, bootstrap, node.js, express, postgreSQL, prisma, supabase

title: Blog
description: A simple website for blogging. Admin can make new blog post, edit or remove any post or comment. User can only view non-draft blog. Created with react, vite, bootstrap, node.js, express, mongoDB

title: Inventory Web Apps
description: A simple website to handle inventory management. User can read, create, delete, update data like category, supplier, item. Or even upload item photo. Created with pug, bootstrap, node.js, express, postgresql, cloudinary, supabase

title: Game - Memory Card
description: A game where user continue to select card without repeating. Images used are from pokeAPI. Created with react, vite

title: CV - Creator
description: A web app where user create an CV by filling in information. Created with react, vite

title: Maple Library
description: A fan-made library for maple story (old school). User can search in-game data, and sort the result by property they futher select.

title: Game - Tic Tac Toe
description: A game where u can play with other human or computer(random move). Created with html, css, javascript

title: To-do-list
description: A web version of to-do-list where data is stored at browser. Created with html, css, javascript

title: Baaaaaattle ship
description: A game where u can play with computer(random move). Created with html, css, javascript

title: YUMEKO's Clothes
description: A fake online shopping cart. User can add item, increase or decrease item's quantity where data is stored at browser. Created with react, react-router, vite

title: Admin Dashboard
description: A simple dashboard UI only. Created with html, css
